text:
Andrew Russell Garfield (born August 20, 1980) is an American-English actor. He is best known for his role as Peter Parker in the 2012 movie "The Amazing Spider-Man". He was born in Los Angeles, California and was raised in Epsom, Surrey. Garfield began his career on the UK stage and in television productions.
In 2018, he won a Tony Award for Best Actor in a Play for his role as Prior Walter in "Angels in America".
